verses.roman:
hiraṇya-garbha, antaryāmī, jagat-kāraṇa
yāṅra aṁśa kari' kare virāṭa-kalpana

synonyms: hiraṇya-garbha—of the name Hiraṇyagarbha; antaḥ-yāmī—the Supersoul; jagat-kāraṇa—the cause of the material world; yāṅra aṁśa kari'-taking as His expansion; kare—does; virāṭa-kalpana—conception of the universal form.
translation: He is the Supersoul, Hiraṇyagarbha, the cause of the material world. The universal form is conceived as His expansion.
